resources.string:
Duration of Study The MSc(CompSc) programme is offered in both full-time and part-time modes.
There are 3 semesters in an academic year, i.e. semester 1: September – December, semester 2: January – May and the summer semester: June – August.
Part-time: 2-3 years
Full-time: 1-2 years
Class Schedule Classes are usually conducted in weekday evenings from 7:00 p.m., or during weekends. Some courses will be offered mainly for full-time students in weekday daytime.
